pages.title: Alignment: Charge
pages.text: <thing>Charge/$ (yellow) will add FE to any machine it hits. By default, it adds 50FE per <thing>power/$.$(br2)<thing>Charge/$ beams with <thing>power/$ >= 16 will summon a lightning bolt if the sky is visible.$(br2)<thing>Charge/$ beams can transmute (cobble)stone into
<thing>Void-Charge/$ AKA <thing>Discharge/$ drain FE from any machine it hits. By default, it drains 50FE per <thing>power/$.$(br2)
